title: Zhengzhou Urban Retreat near Henan University of Technology
description: In the heart of Henan's capital, Crowne Plaza Zhengzhou High Tech Zone, an IHG Hotel, is a serene retreat from the urban jungle below. Awaken refreshed in a stylish guest room before revitalising your body with a dip in the pool or at the fitness centre. title: China French-Inspired Zhengzhou Retreat with Indoor Pool & Spa
description:
Step into a world where East meets West at this trendy hotel, your sophisticated haven in central China's bustling economic hub. The blend of French art de vivre and local Henan culture creates spaces where business travellers unwind in style and leisure guests discover unexpected luxury, all while enjoying panoramic views of the city skyline and ancient Yellow River valley beyond.

From the moment you're greeted by friendly staff, you'll feel the difference in the approach to hospitality. Savour exquisite cuisine at signature restaurants or indulge in world-class spa treatments. Moments from Erqi Memorial Tower, the historic Shang Dynasty ruins and Zhengzhou's top shopping district, this hotel puts the city's treasures at your fingertips.
offer_address: No. 115 Jinshui Road, Henan Province, Zhengzhou 450003, China

title: Centrally Located Zhengzhou Escape just 90-Minutes from World-Heritage Listed Shaolin Temple
description: The lively metropolis of Zhengzhou in China's Henan province beckons, and there’s no better place to be than Crowne Plaza Zhengzhou. Step out of your sophisticated base and visit Zijingshan Park just a stone’s throw away, feed your curiosity for new flavours at the famed Food Street nearby or venture to UNESCO-listed Shaolin Temple. Later, take a refreshing dip in the pool, and savour tasty seafood at the Palm Court Cafe or woodfired pizza at Mamma Mia Italian Restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Zhengzhou, an IHG Hotel
